title: mid
name: mid
description: Extracts a substring from a string.

arguments.name: string
arguments.description: Must be single-quotation mark or double-quotation mark delimited.

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: The position of the first character to retrieve.

arguments.name: count
arguments.description: The number of characters to retrieve. If not set, all characters until the end of the string will be returned.
